title: President Rinkēvičs' speech on the fourth anniversary of war in Ukraine
summary_full: Russia's full-scale war against Ukraine has been going on for four years now, and it has become clear that the end of the war will be neither quick nor easy, said President Edgars Rinkēvičs in a video address on Tuesday, February 24th, the fourth anniversary of Russia's full-scale war against Ukraine.
